trans-unit.source: The type of object that is to be converted.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de objeto a ser convertido.

trans-unit.source: The type the input object is to be converted to.
trans-unit.target: O tipo para o qual o objeto de entrada será convertido.

trans-unit.source: Represents a method that converts an object from one type to another type.
trans-unit.target: Representa um método que converte um objeto de um tipo em outro tipo.

trans-unit.source: The <typeparamref name="TOutput" /> that represents the converted <typeparamref name="TInput" />.
trans-unit.target: O <typeparamref name="TOutput" /> que representa o <typeparamref name="TInput" /> convertido.

trans-unit.source: This delegate is used by the <xref:System.Array.ConvertAll%2A> method of the <xref:System.Array> class and the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List`1.ConvertAll*> method of the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> class to convert each element of the collection from one type to another.
trans-unit.target: Este delegado é usado pelo <xref:System.Array.ConvertAll%2A> método o <xref:System.Array> classe e o <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List`1.ConvertAll*> método do <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> classe para converter cada elemento da coleção de um tipo para outro.

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: Esta seção contém dois exemplos de código.

trans-unit.source: The first demonstrates the <xref:System.Converter%602> delegate with the <xref:System.Array.ConvertAll%2A> method of the <xref:System.Array> class, and the second demonstrates the delegate with the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List`1.ConvertAll*> method of the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> generic class.
trans-unit.target: Demonstra o primeiro o <xref:System.Converter%602> delegar com o <xref:System.Array.ConvertAll%2A> método do <xref:System.Array> classe e a segunda demonstra o delegado com o <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List`1.ConvertAll*> método do <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> classe genérica.

trans-unit.source: The following code example defines a method named `PointFToPoint` that converts a <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structure to a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structure.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir define um método chamado `PointFToPoint` que converte um <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> estrutura para um <xref:System.Drawing.Point> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The example then creates an array of <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures, creates a `Converter<PointF, Point>` delegate (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)` in Visual Basic) to represent the `PointFToPoint` method, and passes the delegate to the <xref:System.Array.ConvertAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo cria uma matriz de <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> estruturas, cria um `Converter<PointF, Point>` delegar (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)` no Visual Basic) para representar o `PointFToPoint` método e passa o delegado para o <xref:System.Array.ConvertAll%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.ConvertAll%2A> method passes each element of the input list to the `PointFToPoint` method and puts the converted elements into a new list of <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Array.ConvertAll%2A> método passa cada elemento da lista de entrada para o `PointFToPoint` método e coloca os elementos convertidos em uma nova lista de <xref:System.Drawing.Point> estruturas.

trans-unit.source: The following code example defines a method named `PointFToPoint` that converts a <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structure to a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structure.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir define um método chamado `PointFToPoint` que converte um <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> estrutura para um <xref:System.Drawing.Point> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The example then creates a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> of <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures, creates a `Converter\<PointF, Point>` delegate (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)` in Visual Basic) to represent the `PointFToPoint` method, and passes the delegate to the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List`1.ConvertAll*> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo cria um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> de <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> estruturas, cria um `Converter\<PointF, Point>` delegar (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)` no Visual Basic) para representar o `PointFToPoint` método e passa o delegado para o <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List`1.ConvertAll*> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List`1.ConvertAll*> method passes each element of the input list to the `PointFToPoint` method and puts the converted elements into a new list of <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List`1.ConvertAll*> método passa cada elemento da lista de entrada para o `PointFToPoint` método e coloca os elementos convertidos em uma nova lista de <xref:System.Drawing.Point> estruturas.
